title: Mayday mayday
creator_credit: B P Film for the Scout Association of Australia, Austral Pacific Productions and Eric Fullilove
brief_description: A film on adventure scouting showing how the movement has kept pace with changing times. It has updated its methods, increased the opportunities for fun and goo living for thousands of young people, but has still kept its ideals. Editor Paul Maxwell. Camera Phil Dority.
